Holy Cow! A Brand Spankin' New NEWS UPDATE!
By Kamdar
9/18/03
First off there have been several promotions in the last few months. New to the Honor Guard are Chameleon, Evellyn, Mnim, Tyrrarius and Xzii. Daliddar was promoted to the High Council. A belated and official congrats to all of you. Keep up the good work.
Rejoining the Fellowship...
The policy for rejoining the Fellowship has been reworked. Among other things, it now states:
"If a member disbands from the Exodus Fellowship they will not be allowed back into the guild...The HC reserves the right to disband, remove forum privileges, and delete any posts including re-applications for disruptive behavior at anytime."
Please consult this page on Disbanding from the Fellowship for more details
The link to it (formerly called "Rejoining the Fellowship" is located in the info section, in the list of links on the right hand side of the page. And please, think twice before you disband. Often problems can be worked out without such a rash decision. The best way to work out problems is to talk about them.
I WANT YOUR PLAT!
Just a reminder that it's that time of year again when I beg for your hard earned cash. The present operation of this site comes to 23.91 a month. It is my wish to keep this site and the Forum ad free, so if you can, throw a few dollars my way and you could receive a shiny new (virtual) Medal of Contribution... And my undying gratitude! For those of you that have already donated, I salute you!
Click here
for more details on how to contribute to the site.

Exodus Focuses on Leveling
By Ursi
9/28/03
As more members hit the magical level of 62, we shall be having more xp opportunities in Bastion of Thunder and Halls of Honor.

Level 58 is also a critical level because this is the minimum level one can group with a level 65 on an adventure.

Congratulations to recent level 62+ dings by: Cobo, Krugan, Mnim , Chastisy

Congratulations to Arathain and Sindee on level 59
